item.title: Java 生成验证码1
item.description: Utility.java import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils; import org.apache.commons.logging.Log; import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory; import java.math.BigDecimal; import java.text.SimpleDateFormat; import java.util.*; public class Utility { protected final static Log logger = LogFactory.getLog(Utility.class); public static <T> List<T> newArray(int size, Class<T> clazz) { List<T> l = new ArrayList<T>(); for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) { T newInstance; try { newInstance = clazz.newInstance(); } catch (Exception e) { newInstance = null; } l.add(newInstance); } return l; } public
